channel.title: Family Sites Programming Movies Experiment on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Family Sites Programming Movies Experiment on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: it appears as though
item.description: i haven’t really been blogging like I should. eh.. I get annoyed with it. so I don’t do it. and then my friends and family contact me and yell. haha. so then I start again. heh. a “never ending” cycle of horror. heh. eh.. it isn’t so bad. I don’t really mind it. I just haven’t had all the extra time in the world. only about half of all the extra time.
